title: How to Make the Recipe of 'the Adventures of Alice in  Wonderland' Drink Me Soup

steps.headline: Chop the fruits.
steps.description: Chop all the fruits using a knife and cutting board. Remove the skin of all the fruits except for the pear and cherries. Arrange them according to the fruits in the cutting board. Do not include the lemon.

steps.headline: Add the ingredients.
steps.description: Pour water in the pot, then set it to a boil. While boiling, add all the fruits, then set to a boil.

steps.headline: Add water.
steps.description: While boiling, mix a half of the tsp of water and cornstarch.

steps.headline: Add lemon.
steps.description: Grate a little of the lemon's skin. Then cut the lemon in half and squeeze in the squeezer. Add the lemon and the grated lemon skin, raw sugar, and the cornstarch and stir for a while.

steps.headline: Boil it.
steps.description: Set it to a boil again. After boiling, using a strainer, remove the excess fruits( you can use it as a snack if you like) then pour in a glass.

steps.headline: Enjoy.
steps.description: You have your very own refreshing drink. You can add some ice cubes in the drink and enjoy it!

text: Chop the fruits. Chop all the fruits using a knife and cutting board. Remove the skin of all the fruits except for the pear and cherries. Arrange them according to the fruits in the cutting board. Do not include the lemon. Add the ingredients. Pour water in the pot, then set it to a boil. While boiling, add all the fruits, then set to a boil. Add water. While boiling, mix a half of the tsp of water and cornstarch. Add lemon. Grate a little of the lemon's skin. Then cut the lemon in half and squeeze in the squeezer. Add the lemon and the grated lemon skin, raw sugar, and the cornstarch and stir for a while. Boil it. Set it to a boil again. After boiling, using a strainer, remove the excess fruits( you can use it as a snack if you like) then pour in a glass. Enjoy. You have your very own refreshing drink. You can add some ice cubes in the drink and enjoy it!
